examples.example: 可爱的企鹅在冰天雪地里欢快地玩耍着。

translate.english: Cute penguins are playing merrily in the world of ice and snow.

examples.example: 那群企鹅在极地世界里自由自在地生活着，给人们带来了无尽的欢乐和惊喜。

translate.english: Those penguins live freely in the polar world, bringing people endless joy and surprises.

examples.example: 企鹅们排着整齐的队伍在雪地上憨态可掬，可爱极了。

translate.english: The penguins are lined up neatly on the snow ground, looking charmingly naive and extremely lovely.
